tables.name: kaiyo_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blocks Table: This table provides information about blocks created in the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains details such as block height and timestamp, validators, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Blockchain block count indicating sequence of transactions and data

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when blockchain block was produced or published

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for blockchain network or chain instance

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: Blockchain account responsible for proposing new blocks

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: Hashed representation of validating nodes or validators

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when block data was ingested into dataset

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: Size of messages or transactions included within blockchain block

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: Total number of transactions within a specific blockchain block

tables.name: kaiyo_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains various attributes of events from the cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into the transaction and block-level data.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: On-chain block number in blockchain identified by a sequential integer value

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Distinct identifier for a particular Cosmos blockchain network or chain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hex-encoded hash uniquely representing a Cosmos transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Sequential identifier for occurrences of an event within a transaction

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event occurring on-chain as per Cosmos event categorization

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: Component or module within the blockchain producing an event

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Contextual metadata key within an event attribute

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Corresponding value associated with an event attribute key

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Sequence number of an attribute within an event

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when event data is ingested into the dataset

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp recorded for the on-chain block the event belongs to

tables.name: kaiyo_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains a detailed view of blockchain events in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing attributes about each event occurrence. The attributes are gathered from a variety of blockchain sources.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Numerical representation of the current block's position in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to a blockchain or network within the Cosmos ecosystem

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique transaction identifier within a blockchain or network

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Sequential index of messages within a transaction on a blockchain

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Sequential index of events within a message on a blockchain

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event occurring on the blockchain, such as transfer or creation

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Key or identifier for an attribute or property within an event or message

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Value associated with an attribute or property within an event or message

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Sequential index of attributes within an event or message

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested or processed for analysis

tables.name: kaiyo_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transaction information from the Cosmos ecosystem, including their status, fees, and associated block information. It provides a comprehensive view of interactions within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block containing the transaction.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of a transaction on the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Detailed information associated with the transaction.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: Log message describing the transaction execution outcome.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Optional comment or note attached to the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Gas fees paid for processing the transaction.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: Transaction execution outcome (e.g., success, failure).

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within a block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Amount of gas consumed during transaction processing.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: Target gas limit for transaction execution.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction data was ingested.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version number of the data schema.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: Coins used to pay transaction fees.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: Account approved to grant transaction fees.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: Account responsible for paying transaction fees.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: Maximum gas allowance for transaction execution.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Flag indicating single-signature transaction mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data representing multi-signature wallet

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: Height after which the transaction will automatically expire.

tables.name: kaiyo_tx_messages
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Transaction Messages: This table contains raw data from transaction messages on various Cosmos chains. It provides a detailed view of the messages exchanged between validators in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the blockchain block containing the transaction

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hash identifier for the transaction

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within a block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: Type of message or event

columns.name: message
columns.description: raw message data

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version of the schema for data encoding

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested into the dataset

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created
